title: Sure, here is a reading list of 20 articles on the analysis and control of text embedding representations, up to 2024. These articles cover various aspects of text embeddings, including their analysis, interpretability, robustness, and control mechanisms
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** - Devlin et al

author.literal: **"Attention is All You Need"** - Vaswani et al.

title: **"Universal Sentence Encoder"**
**"Exploring the Limits of Transfer Learning with a Unified Text-to-Text Transformer"**
**"Contextualized Word Representations for Reading Comprehension"**
**"Analyzing and Interpreting Neural Network Models for NLP"**
**"On the Robustness of Language Encoders against Grammatical Errors"**
**"Probing Neural Network Comprehension of Natural Language Arguments"** - Richardson et al
**"A Survey of Methods for Interpreting and Understanding Deep Neural Networks"** - Montavon et al
**"Understanding and Improving Robustness of Vision Transformers through Patch-based Attention"**
**"Adversarial Attacks on Text Classifiers: A Survey"** - Zhang et al
**"Learning to Control the Specificity in Neural Response Generation"** - See et al
**"Controlling Text Generation with Plug and Play Language Models"**
**"Fine-Tuning Pretrained Language Models: Weight Initializations, Data Orders, and Early Stopping"** - Mosbach et al
**"Analyzing the Structure of Attention in a Transformer Language Model"**
**"On the Importance of the Kullback-Leibler Divergence Term in Variational Autoencoders for Text Generation"**
**"Dissecting Contextual Word Embeddings: Architecture and Representation"** - Liu et al
**"Evaluating the Robustness of Neural Language Models to Input Perturbations"**
**"Controlling Neural Text Generation with Constrained Beam Search"**

author.literal: **"A Survey on Contextual Embeddings"** - Peters et al.

title: These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of research in the field of text embeddings, their analysis, and control mechanisms. They include foundational works, recent advancements, and surveys that cover a wide range of topics relevant to understanding and manipulating text embeddings
